title: Intermediate Medical Spanish Communication Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Spanish grammar and medical terminology comprehension, fundamental pharmaceutical/life science knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical communication training for pharmacy majors to address the growing Spanish-speaking patient population in the U.S.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe patient medical history, symptoms, and prescriptions in Spanish within healthcare contexts
Learners can achieve over 80% comprehension rates in patient consultations by using specialized pharmaceutical terminology in Spanish
Learners can utilize at least three Spanish medical communication strategies that account for cultural differences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
